channel.title: What is the normal wild area?

item.title: What is the normal wild area?
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

what is the normal wild area like on the real runescape and on other non full map pk servers?
this is what my wild safe zone looks like.

code:
public boolean nonWild() {
if((absX >= 2901 && absX <= 2927 && absY >= 9823 && absY <=9845 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >= 3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX<= 3260 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3439 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=2783 && absY >= 3483 && absY <=3517) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

Read full topic
item.source: What is the normal wild area?
